function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective pharmaceutical interventions for new strains of pandemics","Impact":"Delayed response and ineffective protection against new strains of pandemics","Mitigation":"Investing in research and development of rapid response vaccines and antiviral drugs","Technologies":"Medical research and development for rapid response vaccines and antiviral drugs","People":"Public health organizations, pharmaceutical companies, governments","Owner":"Public health organizations, pharmaceutical companies, governments"},{"Description":"Exclusion of architecture and urbanism from pandemic mitigation strategies","Impact":"Lack of effective environmental measures to prevent and mitigate pandemics","Mitigation":"Integration of architecture and urban planning into interdisciplinary scientific approaches to pandemics","Technologies":"Architectural and urban planning technologies for designing disease-resistant built environments","People":"Architects, urban planners, public health experts","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Reliance on non-pharmaceutical interventions at the early stage of a pandemic","Impact":"Limited effectiveness in controlling the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Development and implementation of more effective non-pharmaceutical interventions combined with pharmaceutical measures","Technologies":"Innovative non-pharmaceutical interventions and public health protocols","People":"Public health authorities, governments, medical researchers","Owner":"Public health authorities, governments, medical research organizations"}]}
